com.bitwise.decaf.editor
Interface MaskComponent

All Superinterfaces:
com.bitwise.decaf.editor.FormComponent, HotComponent
All Known Subinterfaces:
DecafTextComponent, DecafTypeComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
DTextField, DTypeBox, Mask
public interface MaskComponent
extends HotComponent, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.FormComponent

A MaskComponent is designed for use in one of the declaration masks: ClassMask, MethodMask and VariableMask. It represents a single field of a GConstruct, and is expected to make that field available to the user for editing. A MaskComponent may also produce other code, and need not necessarily participate in the declaration that its containing mask serves. A MaskComponent is installed into the specified mask with an entry in the configuration file.

Nested classes inherited from class org.hs.jfc.HotComponent

 Collection actions()

 void apply(GConstruct code)
          Called by the containing mask to indicate that this MaskComponent should apply its current value to the field it represents on code.
 void display(GConstruct code)
          Called by the containing mask to indicate that this MaskComponent should obtain a value for the field it represents from code and display it.

Method Detail

actions

public Collection actions()
For each Action returned, the containing mask will create a button and place it next to this MaskComponent.

display

public void display(GConstruct code)
Called by the containing mask to indicate that this MaskComponent should obtain a value for the field it represents from code and display it.

apply

public void apply(GConstruct code)
Called by the containing mask to indicate that this MaskComponent should apply its current value to the field it represents on code.
